description:
Fire and friends make their way to the water kingdom in an attempt to help Tide Warrior Flow.  But Demon King Azul’s minions were ready for them!  The hidden secret of the spear and the hidden treasure are about to be revealed!  Lone Swordsman Dante appears as well to settle his fate with Azul and the battle begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Secret Treasure: The Sea King`s Orb
秘宝 海王のオーブ
